title: Ninety years of Monopoly commemorated with special 50p coin
summary: The Royal Mint has launched a new colorful coin featuring iconic symbols from the popular board game. This collectible piece aims to celebrate the game's enduring legacy and appeal. Fans of the game are expected to admire the design and add it to their collections.

title: Starmer urged to make ‘populist case’ for workers’ rights reforms
summary: A recent large-scale survey indicates that the majority of the public supports employment rights policies, even though many are unaware of the specific bill related to these rights. The findings suggest a disconnect between public opinion and knowledge of legislative details. Advocates aim to increase awareness and engagement regarding the bill's implications for workers.

title: Rising Nato military spending to cause huge spike in emissions, report warns
summary: Experts warn that pollution from armed conflicts may rival Brazil's annual emissions, highlighting serious climate implications. The environmental impact of war can significantly contribute to greenhouse gas emissions. This calls for urgent attention to the overlooked consequences of military activities on climate change.
